title: The Dark Road
description: A group of backpackers on a bus from Bangkok to Siem Reap, Cambodia.Shortly after crossing the Cambodian border one of the group disappears off the side of the road, quickly they discover they have more than the threat of land mines to worry about.One by one they start to lose their minds, then their lives, as their supposed adventure, turns into a terrifying fight for survival on The Dark Road.
author: Marissa Farrar
